months.title: Foundation & Setup
months.subtitle: Build database and launch initial outreach

flowSteps.title: Database & Setup
flowSteps.description: Research 50 franchise systems, set up HubSpot, create email templates

flowSteps.title: Launch Outreach
flowSteps.description: Send personalized emails, LinkedIn connections, book discovery calls

checklist: Research and compile 50 franchise systems from IFA directory
Identify key contacts: CFOs, Controllers, VP Finance for each system
Set up HubSpot with franchise properties (locations, revenue, billing system)
Create email template addressing franchise billing pain points
Prepare 5-minute demo script focusing on royalty automation
Set up basic email sequences in HubSpot (3 follow-ups)
Send 25 personalized emails per week (50 total)
Send 10 LinkedIn connection requests daily
Follow up with all email responses within 24 hours
Book and conduct 3-4 discovery calls

months.title: Scale & Validate
months.subtitle: Generate demos and build relationships

flowSteps.title: Ongoing Outreach
flowSteps.description: Expand to 150 prospects, 20 emails weekly, maintain LinkedIn activity

flowSteps.title: Demo Delivery
flowSteps.description: Conduct 3-4 demos monthly, gather feedback, send proposals

checklist: Expand database to 150 qualified franchise prospects
Send 20 personalized emails weekly to new prospects
Maintain 10 daily LinkedIn connections
Conduct 10 product demos total (3-4 per month)
Record feedback and objections from each demo
Send follow-up proposals within 48 hours of demos
Attend 1 industry event (IFA or regional franchise show)
Pre-schedule 8-10 meetings at the event
Follow up with all event contacts within 48 hours
Identify and qualify 3 pilot opportunities
Sign 1 pilot agreement with implementation timeline

months.title: Convert & Expand
months.subtitle: Convert pilots to paying customers

flowSteps.title: Pilot Management
flowSteps.description: Weekly check-ins, document ROI, gather testimonials

flowSteps.title: Pipeline Growth
flowSteps.description: Maintain 300+ prospects, focus on warm referrals

flowSteps.title: Conversion
flowSteps.description: Present ROI, negotiate contracts, close deals

checklist: Expand database to 300+ qualified prospects
Conduct weekly 30-minute check-ins with all pilot customers
Document time and cost savings for each pilot customer
Address pilot implementation issues within 24 hours
Gather testimonials and case study content from successful pilots
Send 15 emails weekly focusing on warm referrals
Present ROI findings to pilot customers
Propose commercial agreements with pilot customers
Negotiate pricing and contract terms
Convert 2-3 pilots to paying customers
Ask satisfied customers for referrals and introductions
Maintain active pipeline of 20+ opportunities
